subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[ice]]
# to [[rise]] [[high]]; to [[go up]]
# to [[place]] oneself [[above]]; to [[override]]
# to [[ride]] ([[wind]], etc.)
# to [[bully]] and [[humiliate]]; to [[insult]]; to [[encroach]] on; to [[invade]]
# to [[approach]]; to [[draw]] near; to [[close in on]]
# to [[tremble]]
# [[disorderly]]; [[messy]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
